features.title: the bed
features.text: Rest easy in a hybrid mattress enveloped in the sophisticated comfort of Frette linen & terry.

features.title: the bath amenities
features.text: Pamper yourself with luxurious Molton Brown bath amenities and Kassatex pool & beach towels.

features.title: the perfect touches
features.text: Enjoy lounging with an LED flat-screen TV, mini fridge, luxury amenities, and grab & go breakfast.

cozy_rooms.title: atlantic king suite
cozy_rooms.text: Our Atlantic King Suite offers one king size bed and one queen sleeper sofa with a spacious studio layout filled with stylishly designed furnishings.

cozy_rooms.title: hampton king
cozy_rooms.text: Our Hampton King room offers one king size bed with contemporary furnishings. Perfect for solo/business travelers or couples to explore the Eastern End of Long Island.

cozy_rooms.title: cottage king
cozy_rooms.text: Our quaint cottages offer one king size bed and one queen sleeper sofa specifically built for an intimate group of friends or family.

cozy_rooms.title: atlantic double queen
cozy_rooms.text: Our Atlantic Double Queen room offers two queen size beds with contemporary furnishing to enlighten your experience.

cozy_rooms.title: accessible hampton king
cozy_rooms.text: Our mobility and hearing accessible Hampton King room offers one king size bed with a spacious studio layout filled with elegantly designed furnishings. This room includes a roll-in shower, grab bars, a handheld shower head, and smoke and carbon monoxide detectors with strobes. ADA kits available at check-in. If you would like further details regarding the room size and/or features of the accessible rooms, we encourage you to call the hotel and speak with a Guest Service Representative. Any corresponding photos may not reflect the specific accessible room type or room feature.
